title: Dirty Dream
description: **Dirty Dream is a novella/companion story to the brand new release, Dirty Laundry! It is not required to read it beforehand.  I'm a reporter, and I've got the best assignment in the world-get dirt on the hottest country star on the charts, Keith Perkins. The sexy beast who rocks those tight jeans like nobody's business. I'm supposed to learn all of his Dirty Laundry, his deepest and darkest secrets. Without sleeping with him. Easy enough, right? Wrong.
author: Lauren Landish
